subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Collin McHugh, a right-hander, allowed two hits and no runs in seven innings for the Mets, who have lost five straight games, including this four-game sweep by the Rockies.
snippet: Collin McHugh, a right-hander, allowed two hits and no runs in seven innings for the Mets, who have lost five straight games, including this four-game sweep by the Rockies.
